casebody.data:
In the Matter of the Petition of E. M. STATLER, as Owner of THE Vessel MIRAMAR for Limitation of Liability. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 6, 1930. No. 139. Silas B. Axtell, of New York City (Elizabeth Robinson, of New York City, of counsel), for appellants. Kirlin, Campbell, Hickox, Keating & McGrann, of New York City (Charles R. Hickox, Vernon S. Jones, and Edwin S. Murphy, all of New York City, of counsel), for appellees executors of estate of E. M. Statler.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree [31 F.(2d) 767] affirmed.
